rows.label: qst103801_msg001
rows.name: Ah, you all. Do you have a moment?

rows.label: qst103801_msg002
rows.name: Ah, Rex. Do you have a moment?

rows.label: qst103801_msg003
rows.name:
The other day, during my night
watch, I saw a suspicious
shadow near Adel's Tomb.

rows.label: qst103801_msg004
rows.name:
I went closer to check, but no
one was there. So I thought it
might have been my imagination.

rows.label: qst103801_msg005
rows.name:
But others have testified to
seeing it too. They also said
they lost sight of it.

rows.label: qst103801_msg006
rows.name:
Now rumors are starting in
the village that it might
be the work of a ghost.

rows.label: qst103801_msg007
rows.name:
When I think it might be true, I get
so scared I can't sleep at night.

rows.label: qst103801_msg008
rows.name:
For my own peace of mind, I
want you to investigate the
tomb and find out what it is.

rows.label: qst103801_msg009
rows.name:
For my own peace of mind, I want
you, Rex, to investigate the
tomb and find out what it is.

rows.label: qst103801_msg010
rows.name: What do you say? Can I ask this of you?

rows.label: qst103801_msg011
rows.name:
Thank you! That's a relief! The
shadow only appears at night, so try
going to Adel's Tomb at that time.

rows.label: qst103801_msg012
rows.name:
Please prove to me that there
are no such things as ghosts!

rows.label: qst103801_msg101
qst103801_msg102
rows.name: Find out what it is!

rows.label: qst103801_msg201
rows.name:
Oh, you're back. How was it?
Did you find out its identity?

rows.label: qst103801_msg202
rows.name:
I see... I never would have guessed
it was the work of Tirkins.

rows.label: qst103801_msg203
rows.name:
Well, if it's the Fire Dragon
Clan, I can understand.

rows.label: qst103801_msg204
rows.name:
They are very particular about their
ingredients. I hear their chefs travel to
various countries to gather them themselves.

rows.label: qst103801_msg205
rows.name:
Because they put so much effort
into gathering them, their dishes
are said to be exquisite.

rows.label: qst103801_msg206
rows.name: Aww, I wanted to meet them too.

rows.label: qst103801_msg207
rows.name:
In any case, I'm glad they
weren't harmful. Now I can
sleep peacefully. Thank you!
